title: AHS: 1984 Episode 1 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: So excited for the new season! Let's hope they can keep up the nostalgia and energy going for a whole season. Let me know what you thought about the first episode below!
Montana rear ending Xavier in traffic is a funny throw back.  Billie Lourde’s character literally ran him over with a car in the last anthology.
The ear motif is interesting, considering Billie Lourd's character in Scream Queens wears ear muffs as she's afraid of her ears being cut off.
The Night Stalker serial killer that was in this episode, showed up in Hotel to attend James March’s Halloween party as a ghost, thus linking 1984 to Hotel.
Y’all realize that the Night Stalker is historically accurate. It’s Richard Ramirez.
description:
The new season of American Horror Story: 1984 is here and we're going to breakdown episode 1 "Camp Redwood' with theories and details you missed!
